venues.name: Paniolo Ranch
venues.description: Stunning 200-acre ranch venue with panoramic Hill Country views, perfect for rustic elegance weddings.
specialOffers: Book by March 2024 - 10% off weekend rates
venues.bernieRecommendation: Paniolo Ranch is hands down the most breathtaking venue in the Hill Country! The sunset views are absolutely magical, and the staff goes above and beyond for every couple.

venues.name: Tapatio Springs Hill Country Resort
venues.description: Luxury resort venue with multiple ceremony and reception spaces, accommodations for guests, and full-service amenities.
specialOffers: Wedding package includes complimentary spa credits
venues.bernieRecommendation: Perfect for couples who want luxury and convenience all in one place. Your guests will love staying on-site and the spa services are world-class!

photography.name: Hill Country Photography Co.
photography.description: Award-winning wedding photography capturing the natural beauty of Hill Country weddings with an artistic, timeless approach.
photography.bernieRecommendation: Sarah and her team have such a gift for capturing those perfect candid moments that tell your love story.

catering.name: Smokin' J's BBQ Catering
catering.description: Authentic Texas BBQ catering perfect for rustic Hill Country weddings. From brisket to sides, we bring the true Texas experience.
catering.bernieRecommendation: J's brisket is legendary in Boerne! Perfect for couples who want that authentic Texas wedding experience.

planning.name: Hill Country Weddings & Events
planning.description: Premier wedding planning service specializing in Hill Country venues and vendors. From intimate ceremonies to grand celebrations.
specialOffers: Free consultation for Boerne Hub users
planning.bernieRecommendation: Maria and her team are absolute professionals! They know every vendor and venue in the area and will make your wedding planning stress-free.
